title: Densely Packed
content: Close up of the Illustration by Hitomi Terasawa 1.3 human beings per square meter. That was the density of  Kowloon Walled City, an enclave of China that existed for most of the 1900s. Before the site was demolished, a beautiful architectural drawing was made of the city and that's the main point of the post signsofrain created. Seriously, y'all have to see this to believe it!
author: Brandon Blatcher
